app.title: Muzi
app.desc:
With over 130,000 tracks by 11,000 artists and updating daily,
Muzi is the one stop online music player for the IIT Roorkee intranet.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: Unique identifier for a particular listen

fields.name: track_id
fields.desc: integer to identify a unique track/song

fields.name: user_id
fields.desc: integer to identify a unique user

fields.name: timestamp
fields.desc: time of when the track was played by the user

fields.name: id
fields.desc: integer to identify a unique track

fields.name: title
fields.desc: title of the track eg: Lost Stars

fields.name: album_id
fields.desc: integer to identify the album of the track

fields.name: artist
fields.desc: artist of the track eg: Taylor Swift

fields.name: band_id
fields.desc: Unique integer to identify band of the track. In some cases band and artist might be different

fields.name: genre_id
fields.desc: Unique integer to identify genre of the track

fields.name: plays
fields.desc: integer indicating the number of times the track has been played

fields.name: length
fields.desc: length of the track in seconds

fields.name: id
fields.desc: integer to identify a unique album

fields.name: name
fields.desc: name of the album eg: Dhoom 3

fields.name: band_id
fields.desc: Unique integer to identify band of the album
